name: Onday
description: Hey everyone! A while ago I started a personal project that I am doing in my spare time. I am creating a truly minimalistic task manager, and this is the landing page for it. The app's design is still far from the finalised look but I will be happy to keep you updated on the progress of this interesting and promising adventures process of creating an app without a team. Initially I started designing it for personal goals so I wanted to ask what you guys would love to see in your personal perfect task manager but I'm open to any suggestions: if you think a perfect task manager includes business planning, share your thoughts too. Anything will help See more
